CHAT.comment: MICHAEL A. KNOWLES, WARDEN, Petitioner v. ALEXANDRE MIRZAYANCE.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 1:01 p.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN E. MERCER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHARLES M. SEVILLA ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF STEVEN E. MERCER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 2:02 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
